channel.title: IM on My learning and diary
channel.description: Recent content in IM on My learning and diary

item.title: Rich link preview and IM apps
item.description: Two days ago, I have a fun journey to find more about rich link preview features in social media, web apps and IM apps. The journey began with that the shared link of one of my company sites in skype was shown without pictures, just a plain link. Searching the feature of skype "link preview", I found https://socialsharepreview.com/. I knew what missed in the homepage as in the following list.
